Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: As a further thought, the building of these images should be maintained and published under the fabric-chaincode-node component and as such become owned and subject to control by the maintainers of this component.

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: As a further requirement, node chaincode containers need to have a deployment way of determining the grpc options to use when communicating with a peer. This isn't something that should have to be specified by the chaincode package themselves. It is a system setup requirement not the responsibility of chaincode to determine.

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: Another thing we should investigate that may be of use is to reduce the dependency tree fabric-shim, cid and contract-api has on external npm modules. The less we have the better for reducing the risk a vunerabilities that may be disclosed for versions of npm modules used.
